It's as simple as 1-2-3

QuickMessage is an open source project. It's free and easy to use.

Office, home or small network

Why spend money just to 'hi'? QuickMessage is a free solution for your office, home or small network. It has less hassle and more productivity.

Theme

Get away from the boring white background. QuickMessage comes with beautiful themes for boys and girls.

Portable

Put QuickMessage on a thumb drive and you are ready to use it in any computer. It is very portable and easy. Get complete peace of mind.

Cross Platform

Is your friend using Linux but you using windows? No problem. With QuickMessage, you can still chat with each other. Mac and UNIX are available too. Yeah!
